nodes.text: Axvering was an individual who served as a Chief Investigator in the Imperial Security Bureau of the Galactic Empire. At one point, Senator Bail Organa wrote a response to an inquiry to Axvering in regards to a missing UT-60D shipment.
Axvering was first mentioned in the canon 2017 boxed set and reference book authored by Daniel Wallace, Star Wars: The Rebel Files.
